Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Access matters at Concord Road Corporate Center. Located 5 miles from I-495, 6 miles from Route 128/I-95 and 6 miles from the highly regarded Burlington amenities nearby.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Global Investors is pleased to present the following premier workplace solution. Concord Road Corporate Center is in the midst of a complete transformation from the front door to the interior lobbies to the hub of amenities. The 353,000 RSF three-building campus currently has 4,539-148,000 SF block availability. The campu boasts the suite of high-performing amenities that companies need to attract and retain talent. The building reflects expansive glass-line views, on-site management, LEED-certified and highly efficient floor plates.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Premier office space with great neighbors

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is located at the Rt. 3 interchange and abutted by the Courtyard by Marriott and Bright Horizons day care center

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 290 Concord Road in Billerica, MA is the highest quality, single tenant office building in its respective market. Originally constructed by Getronics Wang Corporation as its US Headquarters, it is now owned by a Farley White affiliate, and houses the headquarters of Millipore Sigma Corporation. The striking architecture is highlighted by 10-foot ceilings and its premier interchange location coupled with its modern amenities, including a full service cafeteria, a health club, ATM, lightning protection, and robust backup power and UPS systems, makes 290 Concord Road an ideal site.
